title: Women's cooperative launches sewing enterprise
summary: A women's cooperative started a community sewing enterprise to generate income and skills.
body: Members of a newly formed women's cooperative completed training in garment production and basic business skills. The cooperative will supply school uniforms and local markets, reinvesting profits into community services.

images.caption: Cooperative members at the sewing workshop

body_blocks.text: The enterprise will prioritise local materials and employ cooperative members, creating a sustainable income stream for participating families.
